title: Remove all UI backgrounds for full wallpaper visibility and enhance wallpaper upload with file picker

requirements.text: Remove all background colors, backdrop effects, and opacity overlays from every UI component across the entire application so that the wallpaper is fully visible behind all elements, including the timer display, buttons, controls, cards, sections, dashboard components, study goals, statistics panels, quotes, navigation, settings, and any other UI elements

quotes: just test floating over the wallpaper yes everyone even in the dashboards study goals every i just want to see more of the wallpaper behinf evethinh
Full UI Transparency: Remove all background colors from every UI element (timer display, buttons, controls, dashboard sections, study goals, etc.) so the wallpaper is fully visible behind everything

acceptanceCriteria: All UI components have transparent backgrounds with no colored overlays or backdrop filters
Text and controls float directly over the wallpaper without any background boxes
The wallpaper is fully visible behind all elements on both the timer page and dashboard page
UI elements remain readable and usable with text colors that contrast well against various wallpaper backgrounds

requirements.text: Add a file upload button to the wallpaper section that allows users to select and upload image files directly from their local device, providing an alternative to the existing URL link input method for adding custom wallpapers

quotes: plus for the wallpaper section add a option for image and add files not just link make it easier for ppl to use please
Wallpaper File Upload: Add a file upload option in the wallpaper section alongside the existing URL link option

acceptanceCriteria: A file input button is added to the wallpaper section alongside the existing URL input field
Users can click the button to open their device's file picker and select image files
Selected image files are uploaded and stored as custom wallpapers
The uploaded wallpapers appear in the custom wallpaper grid and can be selected immediately
The file upload option works independently from the URL input method

requirements.text: Implement a functional ambient sound player with audio playback for rain, coffee shop, forest, waves, white noise, and lofi beats sounds, including play/pause controls and a volume slider that adjusts the audio output level

quotes: and why cant i hear ambient sound??

Ambient Sound Player: Implement the ambient sound feature with a curated library of focus sounds (rain, coffee shop, forest, waves, white noise, lofi beats) that you can play during study sessions with volume control

acceptanceCriteria: Audio files or audio sources are integrated for all six ambient sounds: rain, coffee shop, forest, waves, white noise, and lofi beats
Users can select and play any ambient sound from the player interface
The play/pause button correctly starts and stops the selected sound
The volume slider adjusts the audio playback volume in real-time
Only one ambient sound plays at a time
Audio playback works across all browsers and the selected sound/volume persists across page reloads

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo or backend/migration.mo for these changes
Preserve the existing two-page layout structure (timer page and dashboard page)
Keep all existing functionality for custom wallpaper uploads via URL intact
Maintain the existing ambient sound player UI component structure in AmbientSoundPlayer.tsx
nonGoals: Changing the technology stack or component library
Modifying the timer functionality or study tracking logic
Redesigning the overall page layout or navigation structure
Adding new ambient sounds beyond the existing six options
Implementing audio mixing or playing multiple sounds simultaneously
